pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Original Anti-Dandruff Shampoo 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Shampoo For Dandruff soothes itchy, flaky scalp.

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Shampoo for Dandruff contains essential oils for natural, gentle and effective cleansing of flaky, itchy scalp caused by dandruff.

In the 1970's, with years of work, research and lobbying, Eric White pioneered Australia's Tea Tree Oil industry. A crown lease was granted, arriving on a Thursday in 1976...Thursday Plantation was born.

Product Claims: Product not tested on animals.

Size: 250mL

KEY FEATURES

• soothes itchy flaky scalp
• contains 100% Pure Australian Tea Tree Oil
• gentle and effective

Warnings

For external use only. It is recommended you skin patch test prior to use. Discontinue use if sensitivity occurs. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to broken skin. Keep out of reach of children. Not recommended for chemically treated hair.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Product not tested on animals.

Ingredients

Water, TEA Lauryl Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum, Polysorbate 80, Sodium Chloride, Sulfur, Citric Acid, Limonene.

Directions

Wet hair. Gently massage sufficient shampoo into hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
